actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-992.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 94-914.

official_title: Current resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the committee print entitled "Court Proceedings and Actions of Vital Interest to the Congress, Final Report for the 93d Congress, December 1974".

summary.text: Provides for the printing of 500 additional copies of the committee print entitled "Court Proceedings and Actions of Vital Interest to the Congress, Final Report for the 93d Congress, December 1974". States that such documents shall be for the use of the Joint Committee on Congressional Operations.

titles.title: Current resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the committee print entitled "Court Proceedings and Actions of Vital Interest to the Congress, Final Report for the 93d Congress, December 1974".
